snippet.title: Donut Dodo - Insert coin on Atari VCS & Arcades December 1st!
snippet.description:
#AtariVCS #iiRcade #Arcade
ETA December 1st, 2021 (could move by a few days in either direction).

If a long lost arcade game from 1983 resurfaced today, it would be Donut Dodo - a classic 2D platformer from the golden era of games such as Donkey Kong or Jumpman - tough as nails and challenging for the whole family!

You play as Baker Billy Burns, on a quest to collect all your delicious pastries from the insatiable Donut Dodo.

The game features...
- 5 single-screen levels plus a bonus stage, each with their own distinct mechanics and challenges
- incredibly tight controls (no cheap deaths) for frantic single-player arcade gameplay
- old-school screen ratio displaying pixel perfect graphics with a 16-color palette
- an original chiptune soundtrack by the very talented CosmicGem
- worldwide leaderboards, limited to 3-character initials, arcade style

Coming this holiday season!
